mapper.select: select n.notice_no, n.notice_content, n.notice_parent_no, n.notice_regdate, n.member_no, m.member_name from notice n, member m where n.notice_parent_no= 0 and m.member_no= n.member_no order by notice_regdate desc

select n.notice_no, n.notice_content, n.notice_parent_no, n.notice_regdate, n.member_no, m.member_name from notice n, member m where n.notice_parent_no>0 and m.member_no = n.member_no order by notice_regdate desc
select count(*) from notice where notice_parent_no=#{notice_parent_no}
mapper.delete: delete from notice where notice_no=#{notice_no} or notice_parent_no=#{notice_no}
